trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> routed events.
<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> represents the method that implements the command logic of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types and enables the centralization of command logic.
trans-unit.target: 實作邏輯分離命令可從不同來源和類型叫用命令，並且讓命令邏輯的集中化。

trans-unit.source: This event data class is also used for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=fullName>.

But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: 但是大部分的實際的處理常式會處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>從特定事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>，而不是在工作比<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>層級。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that was invoked.
The command associated with the event can be cast to the specific implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, if the type is known.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的命令都可以轉換成的特定實作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，如果類型為已知。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與此事件相關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets data parameter of the command.
This property represents a generic data parameter that is defined by the particular command.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示泛用資料參數所定義的特定命令。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not needed, `null` can be passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此參數，`null`可以傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the Parameter is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，參數用來執行時傳遞給命令的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令所定義的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
